alert.note: Alert for Parke; Vermillion; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 12 at 1:30PM EST until January 17 at 2:30AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Indianapolis IN has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Indiana... Wabash River at Montezuma. .Rainfall amounts of one to two inches across central Indiana today combined with widespread rains of one to two inches earlier in the week will bring elevated river levels to the area, and produce minor lowland flooding along parts of the Wabash River. River flooding could begin on the Wabash at Montezuma Saturday evening and last into early next week. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at Montezuma. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Several hundred acres of bottomlands along the right bank from the mouth of Sugar Creek to northern edge of Montezuma begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 10.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow evening to a crest of 15.4 feet early Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. The next statement should be issued Saturday afternoon by around noon EST.
